cause.description:
You may remember Frankie Abernathy from the San Diego season of MTV's The Real World back in 2004. Frankie was the roommate who was "too punk rock," but still managed to live life to the fullest, and stay true to herself. Sadly, Frankie passed away last weekend, from causes still yet to be determined, after a lifelong battle with cystic fibrosis.
For many of us, Frankie was more than another castmate on The Real World. She gave people a sense of hope, showing the world her problems with cutting, depression, and phobias, and that it was ok to be different. She had the courage to expose her problems and fears, and in turn gave everyone who had the same or similar problems someone to look up to and admire for their courage.
Frankie will definitely be missed by all the people who she has touched. In her memory you can donate funds to:
Frankie Abernathy Scholarship Fund, c/o Jackie Langston 1205 NW Roanoke Drive Blue Springs, MO 64015
and check out the website for the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation at www.cff.org
1. Help to spread awareness and raise funds for the cure of cystic fibrosis
cause.mission: help find a cure for CF through awareness and funds while remembering the life of Frankie Abernathy
cause.name: Frankie Abernathy Fund for Cystic Fibrosis
